import React ,{useEffect,useState}from 'react' import './Home.css'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const navigate=useNavigate(); const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const token=localStorage.getItem("jwt"); if(!token){ navigate("./signup") } // fetching all post fetch("http:/localhost:5000/allposts",{ header:{ "Authorization":"Bearer" + localStorage.getItem("jwt") }, }).then(res=>res.json()) .then(result=>setData(result)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) }, []) return (
{data.map((posts)=>{ // console.log(posts) return (
